languages.text: "С удовольствием просвещу вас. Мой род — древнейший и самый уважаемый на Даргонусе. Множество поколений мои предки шли бок о бок с вашими, заботясь о благополучии этого мира. Мы занимаемся контролем управляющих институтов подвластных вам систем, а также отвечаем за логистику и экономическую стабильность протектората".

traits.locale_text: "С удовольствием просвещу вас. Мой род — древнейший и самый уважаемый на Даргонусе. Множество поколений мои предки шли бок о бок с вашими, заботясь о благополучии этого мира. Мы занимаемся контролем управляющих институтов подвластных вам систем, а также отвечаем за логистику и экономическую стабильность торговой империи".

languages.text: "It would be my pleasure to enlighten you. My house is the oldest and most respected on Dargonus. My ancestors walked side by side with yours for many generations as they cared for this world's welfare. Our duty is to supervise the governing bodies within the systems subservient to you, and we are responsible for the protectorate's logistics and economic stability."
languages.original_text: "С удовольствием просвещу вас. Мой род — древнейший и самый уважаемый на Даргонусе. Множество поколений мои предки шли бок о бок с вашими, заботясь о благополучии этого мира. Мы занимаемся контролем управляющих институтов подвластных вам систем, а также отвечаем за логистику и экономическую стабильность протектората".

My ancestors walked side by side with yours for many generations as they cared for this world's welfare. Our duty is to supervise the governing bodies within the systems subservient to you, and we are responsible for the trade empire's logistics and economic stability."

"It would be my pleasure to enlighten you. My house is the oldest and most respected on Dargonus. My ancestors walked side by side with yours for many generations as they cared for this world's welfare. Our duty is to supervise the governing bodies within the systems subservient to you, and we are responsible for the protectorate's logistics and economic stability."

languages.text: “我很高兴能向您介绍我们的情况。我的家族是达戈努斯最古老、最受人尊敬的家族。我的祖先与您的祖先并肩合作了许多代，双方都在为这个世界的福祉而努力。我们的职责是监督隶属于您的星系的管理机构，负责保障王朝的后勤运输与经济稳定。”
languages.original_text: "It would be my pleasure to enlighten you. My house is the oldest and most respected on Dargonus. My ancestors walked side by side with yours for many generations as they cared for this world's welfare. Our duty is to supervise the governing bodies within the systems subservient to you, and we are responsible for the protectorate's logistics and economic stability."

traits.locale_text: “我很高兴能向您介绍我们的情况。我的家族是达戈努斯最古老、最受人尊敬的家族。我的祖先与您的祖先并肩合作了许多代，双方都在为这个世界的福祉而努力。我们的职责是监督隶属于您的星系的管理机构，负责保障王朝的后勤运输与经济稳定。”

languages.text: «Será un placer educarle al respecto. Mi casa es la más antigua y respetada de Dargonus. Mis antepasados acompañaron a los suyos durante generaciones mientras cuidaban del bienestar de este mundo. Nuestro deber es supervisar los órganos de gobierno en los sistemas bajo su mandato y somos responsables de la logística y la estabilidad económica del protectorado».
languages.original_text: "It would be my pleasure to enlighten you. My house is the oldest and most respected on Dargonus. My ancestors walked side by side with yours for many generations as they cared for this world's welfare. Our duty is to supervise the governing bodies within the systems subservient to you, and we are responsible for the protectorate's logistics and economic stability."

traits.locale_text: «Será un placer educarle al respecto. Mi casa es la más antigua y respetada de Dargonus. Mis antepasados acompañaron a los suyos durante generaciones mientras cuidaban del bienestar de este mundo. Nuestro deber es supervisar los órganos de gobierno en los sistemas bajo su mandato y somos responsables de la logística y la estabilidad económica del protectorado».

languages.text: 「私めで良ければ喜んでご教示いたします。我々はダルゴナスでもっとも古く、もっとも尊敬されている家系です。私の先祖は何世代にもわたり、自由開拓者様と肩を並べて、この世界の福祉を支えてきました。我々の責務はあなたに従属する星系内の統治組織を監督することであり、保護領の物流と経済の安定に責任を負っています」
languages.original_text: "It would be my pleasure to enlighten you. My house is the oldest and most respected on Dargonus. My ancestors walked side by side with yours for many generations as they cared for this world's welfare. Our duty is to supervise the governing bodies within the systems subservient to you, and we are responsible for the protectorate's logistics and economic stability."

traits.locale_text: 「私めで良ければ喜んでご教示いたします。我々はダルゴナスでもっとも古く、もっとも尊敬されている家系です。私の先祖は何世代にもわたり、自由開拓者様と肩を並べて、この世界の福祉を支えてきました。我々の責務はあなたに従属する星系内の統治組織を監督することであり、保護領の物流と経済の安定に責任を負っています」

languages.text: "Ich werde Euch mit Freuden erleuchten. Mein Haus ist das älteste und angesehenste auf Dargonus. Meine Vorfahren gingen über viele Generationen an der Seite der Euren und kümmerten sich um das Wohlbefinden dieser Welt. Unsere Pflicht besteht darin, die Regierungsstellen zu überwachen, die Euch unterstellt sind, und wir sind verantwortlich für die Logistik und die wirtschaftliche Stabilität des Protektorats."
languages.original_text: "It would be my pleasure to enlighten you. My house is the oldest and most respected on Dargonus. My ancestors walked side by side with yours for many generations as they cared for this world's welfare. Our duty is to supervise the governing bodies within the systems subservient to you, and we are responsible for the protectorate's logistics and economic stability."

traits.locale_text: "Ich werde Euch mit Freuden erleuchten. Mein Haus ist das älteste und angesehenste auf Dargonus. Meine Vorfahren gingen über viele Generationen an der Seite der Euren und kümmerten sich um das Wohlbefinden dieser Welt. Unsere Pflicht besteht darin, die Regierungsstellen zu überwachen, die Euch unterstellt sind, und wir sind verantwortlich für die Logistik und die wirtschaftliche Stabilität des Protektorats."

languages.text: « Avec grand plaisir. Ma maison est la plus ancienne et la plus respectée de Dargonus. Depuis des générations, mes ancêtres travaillent aux côtés des vôtres pour veiller au bien-être et à la prospérité de ce monde. Notre devoir est de superviser les corps gouvernants des systèmes sous votre contrôle, de gérer l'aspect logistique du protectorat et de veiller à sa stabilité économique. »
languages.original_text: "It would be my pleasure to enlighten you. My house is the oldest and most respected on Dargonus. My ancestors walked side by side with yours for many generations as they cared for this world's welfare. Our duty is to supervise the governing bodies within the systems subservient to you, and we are responsible for the protectorate's logistics and economic stability."

traits.locale_text: « Avec grand plaisir. Ma maison est la plus ancienne et la plus respectée de Dargonus. Depuis des générations, mes ancêtres travaillent aux côtés des vôtres pour veiller au bien-être et à la prospérité de ce monde. Notre devoir est de superviser les corps gouvernants des systèmes sous votre contrôle, de gérer l'aspect logistique du protectorat et de veiller à sa stabilité économique. »

languages.text: "Sizi aydınlatmak benim için bir zevk olur. Hanem, Dargonus'un en eski ve saygın hanesidir. Atalarım nesillerdir atalarınızla yan yana hareket etmiş, bu dünyanın iyiliği için çabalamıştır. Vazifemiz, himayeniz altındaki sistemlerin yönetim kademelerini gözlemlemektir. Ayrıca protektoranın lojistik ve ekonomik istikrarından da biz sorumluyuz."
languages.original_text: "It would be my pleasure to enlighten you. My house is the oldest and most respected on Dargonus. My ancestors walked side by side with yours for many generations as they cared for this world's welfare. Our duty is to supervise the governing bodies within the systems subservient to you, and we are responsible for the protectorate's logistics and economic stability."

traits.locale_text: "Sizi aydınlatmak benim için bir zevk olur. Hanem Dargonus'un en eski ve en saygın hanesidir. Atalarım nesillerdir sizin atalarınızla yan yana hareket etmiş ve bu dünyanın iyiliği için çabalamıştır. Vazifemiz, himayeniz altındaki sistemlerin yönetim kademelerini gözlemlemektir ve ayrıca protektoranın lojistik ve ekonomik istikrarından da biz sorumluyuz."
